title: Reporting for intent feeding, swear and abusing
body:
A story of each of the people being reported;

_Name Removed_ (Kassadin): He instalocked mid lane, and decided to slowly feed the game. He began swearing later in the game, and abused the whole team for no reason, even though he took mid off syndra. He told everyone to 'report' me and ashe for no apparant reason, even though he was the one to instalock mid, abuse us, and swear at us. He then calls me a psychotic a**hole after the game.

_Name Removed_ (Syndra): The lobby began with syndra going mid, then kassadin decides to go and instalock mid. She then says 'enjoy the game' to us, and runs down mid and feeds first kill to talon. This continues on slowly through the game, as she keeps giving them free kills. She then eventually afks at a certain point and returns.

_Name Removed_ (Blitzcrack): Same with blitzcrank as well, he calls ashe an idiot and some other profanity words because she didn't go adc, because she called top apparantly. 10 minutes into the game, he started saying words in chinese, and one of them according to kassadin was 'f**k your mum'. He afks for the rest of the game at certain point as well.

replies.body: lol lovely game. This is getting out of hand, riot should give one chance then banned
Na I think they got punished xD
